Magic
Spell Slots: K0: 2; K1: 1; W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 2 Attack: K: 7; W: 6 Spell DC: K: 15; W: 14
Spells:
Blink (W3 Tran): Self becomes ethereal 50% of time for 1 min
Charm Person (K1 Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or energy [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cloudkill (W5 Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Constitution half), moves away 10'/rd for conc or 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Dancing Lights (W0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights move 60' for conc or 1 min
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 2 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Enlarge/Reduce (W2 Tran): R30' Target becomes dbl (Adv on Strength, +1d4 weapon damage) or half (Disadv on Strength, -1d4 weapon damage) size for conc or 1 min
Feather Fall (W1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60'/rd for 1 min
Find Familiar (W1 Conj): R10' Self gains service from summoned spirit in animal form
Fire Bolt (W0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 1d10 HP fire
Fire Shield (W4 Evoc): Self gains resistance to heat or cold damage, successful melee attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Leomund's Secret Chest (W4 Conj): Touched chest moves to and from Ethereal Plane for 60+ days
Light (W0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Mage Hand (W0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks moving up to 10 lb for 1 min
Magic Circle (W3 Abju): R10' 10' circle prevents passage and inflicts DisAdv on attacks by specified creature type for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Polymorph (W4 [Shapechanger] Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg) for conc or 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Ray Of Sickness (W1 Necr): R60' Target suffers 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Constitution not poisoned) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Scorching Ray (W2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Spider Climb (W2 Tran): Touched crawls on walls and ceilings for conc or 1 hr
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius causes retching for conc or 1 min
Stoneskin (W4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Telekinesis (W5 Tran): R60' Moves 1000 lb 30'/rd (Strength neg) for conc or 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 K0 spells/May cast chosen K1 spell 1/long rest
Arcane Recovery: May recover 5 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Minor Alchemy: May change substance of 1' cu per 10 min effort for conc or 1 hr
Ritual Casting: May cast a known spell using a ritual
Shapechanger: Knows Polymorph; may transform self into a CR 1 creature 1/short rest
Transmutation Savant: May copy transmutation spells into spellbook for half cost
Transmuter's Stone: Stone gives choice of 60' darkvision, +10' Speed, proficiency on Constitution saves, or resistance to chosen energy damage; may change effect when casting a transmutation spell
